message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive price of $120. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering its high value and quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium for a quality product, but $120 is a bit above my budget. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate. For your convenience, I am now offering the product at $100. I hope this meets your expectations and allows you to enjoy the benefits of our high-quality item.
